Title: Control Property Generator
Description: Control Property Generator is a  tool  which would generate all /selected properties of all /selected controls on a web page in one go.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Control Property Generator tool would generate all /selected properties of all /selected controls on a web page in one go. It will also generate the .cs file template for the page control objects which can be used in the Code First automation framework ( https://codeduicodefirst.codeplex.com).

The main features are:
  1. Provides output in an easy readable excel format, showing the control identification, its type and all its properties separated by Key:Value pairs.
  2. Generates the .cs file template for the all page control objects.
  3. Customizable to the type of control for which property needs to be generated (ex. HtmlButton, HtmlTable, HtmlEdit etc.)
  4. Customizable for type of properties to be generated (ex. Id,InnerText,Title,Name,ClassName etc.)
  5. Provides an option to generate ALL properties of ALL controls if no filter is provided.
  6. In case of an error reads the TRX file and provides with the error message.



App config Key description :
  1. “Path” – The path where the excel with all control properties will be created.
  2. "MSTEST" – The version of MStest.exe to be used (for VS 2013 installation this has to be 12.0 and for VS 2012 it should be 11.0).
  3. "ControlList" – The type of controls separated by comma (ex. HtmlButton,HtmlHyperlink,HtmlCheckBox).
  4. "PropertyList" - The type of properties to be generated separated by comma (ex. Id,InnerText,Title,Name,ClassName).
TagList: coded ui automation,code first,control properties,property generator,
